3FD64CDE.Line5.10E35E: Thank you... Curse my foolishness. I shouldn't have let him go.

45365F8B.Line11.10E35E: A poor comfort to me, but it would comfort Symon. Thank you for bringing me back what was left of him.

8ECEF95A.Line1.10E35E: No! Akarat... I had some hope...

D8F1EA65.Line3.BAE4: I'm so sorry. I managed to collect some of his writings. I thought you might like this - a thing to remember him by.

E6F0DE2B.Line9.BAE4: This wasn't your fault. But the man responsible - Elias - is gone.
